Accommodation in the Nosy Be can be very expensive (up to twice that of the mainland) and will often lack 21st century conveniences.
You can best travel to the Nosy Be by taking a speedboat from Ankify. Two ferries also will take you from Ankify, but these are much slower, and only recommended if you have to take a car with you.

value: content=Fully crewed charters inclusive of catered meals, all activities, fuel. Fishing, snorkelling, scuba, kayaking. Explore deserted beaches and uninhabited islands. Nice and steady so sea sickness not a problem.
